fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Select a player at night to stone.
Attributes: Stoned players will be revealed at the beginning of the day and cannot do anything at all.
Once a stoned player is visited three times, they will be unstoned.
You may turn yourself to stone by selecting yourself. You will still be able to use your abilities though.
You may select yourself at night to unstone yourself and all stoned players.
Once you turn yourself to stone, you may secretly kill a player that has been stoned for two nights during the day.
They will not be revealed as dead until they are unstoned and theyâ€™ll still count towards the voting majority. If you were the one who unstoned them, they will be cleaned.
